Introduction
This topic contains general information on Death Compensation, including
definition of Death Compensation
action to take if Death Compensation is a greater benefit for a surviving parent
election of DIC in lieu of Death Compensation
, and
considering in-service waiver of insurance premium cases
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1 - Death Compensation
citation: Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section None
